plane in Oklahoma City,

237.37.text:

243.17.text:
As I'm flyin' in

244.60.text:
to see the extreme
elevation changes.

246.73.text:
In my mind I thought this
place would be flat

249.10.text:
but I'm seeing

251.17.text:
and huge expanses
of rain forest.

253.43.text:
Someone mentions

257.77.text: but I can certainly believe it.

A local points to a
volcano in the distance

and it truly sinks in that

265.23.text:
I soon find out that Costa
Rica has 6 active volcanos

268.20.text:
and over 60 inactive ones
and I silently pray

271.10.text:
that they stay that way

273.83.text:
And, oh, by the way,
they have earthquakes

275.40.text:
almost every day but I'm assured

279.07.text:
But if you can get
past all of that,

280.93.text:
Costa Rica has become
one of the most stable,

283.23.text:
prosperous, progressive
nations in Latin America.

286.20.text:
Although this country
only has a fraction

288.10.text:
of a percentage of the
world's land mass,

290.43.text:
it contains 5% of the
world's bio-diversity.

293.77.text:
Amazingly, 25% of this
country's land area

296.60.text:
is in protected national
parks and protected areas.

301.93.text:
to diminish de-forestation
from some of the worst rates

304.63.text:
in the world from 1973 to

these forests are homes

320.77.text:
and the Central

331.27.text:

334.73.text:

Costa Rica is also a

including the world's

Unfortunately, it

Today, this little
